attributes.action: ban the usage of Narconon in any publicly funded orgianisation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Narconon is currently used in some U.k based schools and prisons.  A study by the Sunday Times shows schools are often unaware of its links to the "Church" of Scientology.  
Narconon also promotes a number of unorthodox theories and treatments — based on Hubbard’s work — which experts say are not backed by scientific evidence.
It is clear it should not be used as a  drug rehabilitation method in any public organisation
